extendedInfo.description: This free App allows you to book a Taxi from West Quay Cars (Southampton). You can:* Make a booking for now or in the future* Check its status and track your taxi on a map* Create and manage your favourite addresses* Find your location with GPS* Cancel a booking* Manage previous bookingsThe quickest way to book a taxi in the Southampton area, West Quay Cars free Android App lets you book directly into our system bypassing any queue there may be on the phones. Once you have set up your favourite addresses you can literally book a cab in 3 seconds flat!You will be able to see how far away your taxi is with our LIVE Tracking feature and choose to have a text or a call-back when the taxi arrives. You can either manually search for your address or pick-up point or you can use your phoneâs GPS to find out where you are. Choose the type of taxi that you want: standard car, estate or an MPV, cancel your booking if you need to and even manage your previous bookings.  This app has been designed to be used for journeys within a 20 mile (30 km) radius of Southampton.Please note that we cannot respond to reviews and feedback here in the store, so please use the support email: taxi@westquaycars.com if you need assistance or have any suggestions. Weâd love to hear from you.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, really useful. The ability to track the location of your taxi is really helpful.
reviews.author: James Snowdon

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: App is good taxi service however is poor. They do not read special instructions at all .
reviews.author: Steve Wingfield

reviews.title: Fantastic Handy App
reviews.comment: Works a treat. Booked a cab using the app, then phoned straight after to enquire about the price and the operator had my booking in front of her. Cracking. Only gets a 4/5 as they could do with a quote section for your journey, but I understand the restrictions around telling people here\'s a guestimate and the problems this could cause if fare is then more.
reviews.author: David Edwards

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Perfect if you do the same journeys regularly as you can save favourite locations for quick look up. Search feature is excellent. Simple, intuitive, brilliant. The more I use it the more I love it. A lesson in how apps should be written.
reviews.author: Paul Turner

reviews.title: That\'s better
reviews.comment: I just sent my son by taxi from Portswood to Shirley and I can see the way where a car is , need just refreshing. Cool ;)
reviews.author: Dawid Modelski

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Really nice smart drivers, they even wear uniforms! Definitely recommend them
reviews.author: Stephen Phillips

reviews.title: Taxi booking DIY
reviews.comment: Great app but I may be a but bias lol.
reviews.author: Richard Campbell
